00018 AbsDefGroup::AbsDefGroup(QWidget *parent): 
00019 QGroupBox(tr("Signals (Abstraction Definition)"), parent),
00020 newSignalButton_(tr("Add new signal"), this),
00021 newSignalOptionsButton_(tr("Add new signal options"), this),
00022 importButton_(tr("Import csv"), this),
00023 exportButton_(tr("Export csv"), this),
00024 portView_(this),
00025 portModel_(this) {
00026 
00027         portView_.setModel(&portModel_);
00028 
00029         connect(&newSignalButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00030                 &portModel_, SLOT(addSignal()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031         connect(&newSignalOptionsButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00032                 this, SLOT(onAddSignalOptions()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033         connect(&importButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00034                 this, SLOT(onImport()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035         connect(&exportButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00036                 this, SLOT(onExport()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00037         
00038         connect(&portModel_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00039                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00040         connect(&portModel_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00041                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042         connect(&portModel_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00043                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044         connect(&portModel_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00045                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00046 
00047         connect(&portView_, SIGNAL(removeItems(const QModelIndexList&)),
00048                 &portModel_, SLOT(removeIndexes(const QModelIndexList&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049         connect(&portView_, SIGNAL(copyItems(const QModelIndexList&)),
00050                 &portModel_, SLOT(copyIndexes(const QModelIndexList&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);          
00051 
00052         setupLayout();
00053 }

00058 void AbsDefGroup::onImport() {
00059         QSettings settings;
00060         QString homePath = settings.value(QString("general/defaultDir"), 
00061                 QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00062 
00063         QString path = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Select csv-file to import"),
00064                 homePath);
00065 
00066         // if user clicked cancel
00067         if (path.isEmpty())
00068                 return;
00069 
00070         portModel_.importCSV(path);
00071 }
00072 
00073 void AbsDefGroup::onExport() {
00074         QSettings settings;
00075         QString homePath = settings.value(QString("general/defaultDir"), 
00076                 QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00077 
00078         QString path = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, tr("Save a csv-file"), 
00079                 homePath, tr("Text files (*.csv)"));
00080 
00081         // if user clicked cancel
00082         if (path.isEmpty())
00083                 return;
00084 
00085         portModel_.exportCSV(path);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void AbsDefGroup::onAddSignalOptions() {
00089         portModel_.addSignalOptions(portView_.selected());
00090 }
00091 
00092 void AbsDefGroup::save() {
00093         // tell port model to transfer the ports to the abstraction definition
00094         portModel_.save();
00095 }
00096 
00097 void AbsDefGroup::setupLayout() {
00098         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00099         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00100         buttonLayout->addWidget(&newSignalButton_);
00101         buttonLayout->addWidget(&newSignalOptionsButton_);
00102         buttonLayout->addWidget(&importButton_);
00103         buttonLayout->addWidget(&exportButton_);
00104         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00105 
00106         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00107         topLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00108         topLayout->addWidget(&portView_, 1);
00109 }

00112         portModel_.setAbsDef(absDef);
